submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        res = inf
        n = len(nums)
        dui = []
        c = Counter()
        for i in range(n//2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[n - i - 1]
            v = abs(a - b)
            f = max(k - a, a, b, k - b)
            c[v] += 1
            heappush(dui, f)
        # print(c, dui)
        cur = 0
        for a, b in sorted(c.items()):
            while dui and dui[0] < a:
                heappop(dui)
                cur += 1
            res = min(res, cur + n//2 - b)
        return res
